mapper.insert: insert into race_plan( rp_meet, rp_rcDate, rp_rcDay, rp_rcNo, rp_chulNo, rp_hrName, rp_hrNo, rp_prd, rp_sex, rp_age, rp_wgBudam, rp_rating, rp_jkName, rp_jkNo, rp_trName, rp_trNo, rp_owName, rp_owNo, rp_ilsu, rp_rcDist, rp_dusu, rp_rank, rp_prizeCond, rp_ageCond, rp_stTime, rp_budam, rp_rcName, rp_chaksun1, rp_chaksun2, rp_chaksun3, rp_chaksun4, rp_chaksun5 ) values( #{rp_meet}, DATE_ADD(#{rp_rcDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY), #{rp_rcDay}, #{rp_rcNo}, #{rp_chulNo}, #{rp_hrName}, #{rp_hrNo}, #{rp_prd}, #{rp_sex}, #{rp_age}, #{rp_wgBudam}, #{rp_rating}, #{rp_jkName}, #{rp_jkNo}, #{rp_trName}, #{rp_trNo}, #{rp_owName}, #{rp_owNo}, #{rp_ilsu}, #{rp_rcDist}, #{rp_dusu}, #{rp_rank}, #{rp_prizeCond}, #{rp_ageCond}, #{rp_stTime}, #{rp_budam}, #{rp_rcName}, #{rp_chaksun1}, #{rp_chaksun2}, #{rp_chaksun3}, #{rp_chaksun4}, #{rp_chaksun5} )
mapper.select: select rp_rcDate,rp_rcNo,rp_meet,rp_rank,rp_rcDist,rp_dusu,rp_stTime,rp_rcName,rp_rcDay from race_plan where rp_meet = #{rp_meet} group by rp_rcDate,rp_rcNo,rp_rcDist,rp_rank,rp_dusu,rp_stTime,rp_rcName,rp_rcDay

select rp_rcDate,rp_rcNo,rp_meet,rp_rank,rp_rcDist,rp_dusu,rp_stTime,rp_rcName,rp_rcDay,rp_budam,rp_prizeCond,rp_ageCond,rp_ilsu, rp_chaksun1,rp_chaksun2,rp_chaksun3,rp_chaksun4,rp_chaksun5 from race_plan where rp_rcNo = #{rp_rcNo} and rp_rcDate=#{rp_rcDate} and rp_meet=#{rp_meet} group by rp_rcDist,rp_rank,rp_dusu,rp_stTime,rp_rcName,rp_meet,rp_ilsu,rp_rcDay,rp_budam,rp_prizeCond,rp_ageCond ,rp_chaksun1,rp_chaksun2,rp_chaksun3,rp_chaksun4,rp_chaksun5

select A.rp_chulNo,A.rp_hrName,A.rp_prd,A.rp_rcNo,A.rp_sex,A.rp_age,A.rp_rating,A.rp_wgBudam,A.rp_jkName,A.rp_trName,A.rp_owName,A.rp_dusu,A.rp_ilsu, B.hr_rcCntT,B.hr_ord1CntT,B.hr_ord2CntT,B.hr_ord3CntT,B.hr_rcCntY,B.hr_ord1CntY,B.hr_ord2CntY,B.hr_ord3CntY from race_plan A INNER JOIN horses B ON A.rp_hrNo = B.hr_no where rp_rcNo = #{rp_rcNo} and rp_rcDate=#{rp_rcDate} and rp_meet=#{rp_meet} order by rp_chulNo

select rp_rcDate,rp_rcNo,rp_meet,rp_rank,rp_rcDist,rp_dusu,rp_stTime,rp_rcName,rp_rcDay from race_plan where rp_meet = #{rp_meet} AND rp_rcDate = #{rp_rcDate} group by rp_rcDate,rp_rcNo,rp_rcDist,rp_rank,rp_dusu,rp_stTime,rp_rcName,rp_rcDay
